pages.text: The Prickly Belt is a handy trinket, able to store status effects.$(br2)When the wearer of the belt is harmed, they will receive positive and neutral status effects stored in the belt. Ff a negative effect is stored in the belt, it will instead be applied to the attacker, if present, at the cost of some $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars#internalme)ME$().
To add a status effect, simply combine the belt with a Potion. The amount of uses is based off on both duration and amplifier of the used Potion.
